alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 03 at 8:44PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for... Western Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Central Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 844 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Downtown Mobile. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. Be cautious around water street and poor drainage areas within downtown Mobile.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
